mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENTBOARD ORDER BY COMMENTNO DESC, GROUPSEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTBOARD VALUSE( COMMENTNOSEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT COMMENTNO FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{groupno}), (SELECT GROUPSEQ FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{groupseq}) + 1, (SELECT TITLETAB +1 FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{titletab}), #{freeboardseq}, #{userid}, #{commentcontent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTBOARD SET GROUPSEQ = GROUPSEQ +1 WHERE GROUPNO = (SELECT GROUPNO FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{groupno}) AND GROUPSEQ > (SELECT GROUPSEQ FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{groupseq})
